root.name: Princess Lover!

For more information, please visit AnimeVice's Princess Lover Â series page.System RequirementsOperating System: Windows 2000 / XP / Vista CPU: Pentium III 500 MHz (800MHz recommended) RAM: 128MB (256 MB recommended) Video Card: DirectDraw-capable Sound Card: DirectSound-capable HDD: 4GB or more free DVD-ROM: 2x or better DirectX: 9.0 or higher.
